title: ST_UNION_AGG | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs:
Given a GEOGRAPHY column, returns a GEOGRAPHY object that represents the combined set of points that are in
at least one of the shapes represented by the objects in the column (that is, the union of the shapes).
The function returns a value of type GEOGRAPHY.

The following example uses a table that contains GEOGRAPHY objects that represent counties in different states. For each state,
the example returns the shape that consists of the union of the areas of the counties in that state.
